## SAP_HR_MONTHLY

###### Author: Prathap A
###### Date: 25/02/2025

###### version : 0001
###### <u>Description</u>:
This template is designed to facilitate the monthly processing and harmonization of SAP HR data. It includes steps for initializing the environment, creating and managing Delta tables, and inserting data into harmonized tables. The template ensures that HR data is accurately transformed, stored, and made available for reporting and analysis.

%%sql



-- Step 2: Create a temporary table to store Report_MonthEnd_Date values
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW MonthEndDates AS
SELECT cast(Report_MonthEnd_Date as date)
FROM odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr_monthly
GROUP BY Report_MonthEnd_Date;

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR AS target
USING MonthEndDates AS source
ON target.Report_MonthEnd_Date = source.Report_MonthEnd_Date
WHEN MATCHED THEN DELETE;

-- Step 3: Extract file date from the source file name
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW FileDate AS
SELECT 
    to_date(substring(file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd') AS file_date
FROM 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement
LIMIT 1;

-- Step 4: Calculate staff cost
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW StaffCost AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    h.PSgroup AS grade,
    h.Annualsalary AS salary,
    CAST(h.Annualsalary AS DOUBLE) / (365.0 * 7.4) AS hourly_rate,
    CASE 
        WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
        ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
    END AS leave_start_date,
    to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd') AS date_from_file_name,
    le.Number * ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1) AS expected_leave_taken_hrs,
    le.Number * (1 - ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS expected_leave_hours_remaining,
    le.Number AS leave_allowance,
    ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1) AS percent_leave_year_passed,
    (1 - ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS percent_leave_year_remaining,
    h.ContractType
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr_monthly h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
ON 
    h.PersNo = CASE 
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.StaffNumber)
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.StaffNumber)
        ELSE CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING)
    END
CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd
WHERE 
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P';

-- Step 5: Calculate carried-over hours
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW CarriedOver AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    CASE 
        WHEN le.Number - 148 >= 0 THEN 148
        ELSE le.Number
    END AS carried_over_hours
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr_monthly h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
ON 
    h.PersNo = CASE 
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.StaffNumber)
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.StaffNumber)
        ELSE CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING)
    END
WHERE 
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward';

-- Step 6: Calculate leave taken
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW LeaveTaken AS
SELECT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    SUM(f.absence_hours) AS leave_hours_taken
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr_monthly h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all f
ON 
    h.PersNo = cast(f.staffnumber as int)
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost l 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int) = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int) = co.staff_number
CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd  -- Add this join to reference fd.file_date
WHERE 
    f.AttendanceorAbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    --AND f.absence_date BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND fd.file_date
GROUP BY 
    h.PersNo;

-- Step 7: Insert data into the historical table
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
SELECT 
    h.PersNo,
    h.Firstname,
    h.Lastname,
    h.EmployeeNo,
    h.CoCd,
    h.CompanyCode,
    h.PA,
    h.PersonnelArea,
    h.PSubarea,
    h.PersonnelSubarea,
    h.Orgunit,
    h.OrganizationalUnit,
    h.Organizationalkey,
    h.OrganizationalKey1,
    h.WorkC,
    h.WorkContract,
    h.CT,
    h.ContractType,
    h.PSgroup,
    h.PayBandDescription,
    h.FTE,
    h.Wkhrs,
    h.IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
    h.S,
    h.EmploymentStatus,
    h.GenderKey,
    h.TRAStartDate,
    h.TRAEndDate,
    h.TRAStatus,
    h.TRAGrade,
    h.PrevPersNo,
    h.ActR,
    h.ReasonforAction,
    h.Position,
    h.Position1,
    h.CostCtr,
    h.CostCentre,
    h.CivilServiceStart,
    h.DatetoCurrentJob,
    h.SeniorityDate,
    h.DatetoSubstGrade,
    h.PersNo1,
    h.NameofManagerOM,
    h.ManagerPosition,
    h.ManagerPositionText,
    h.CounterSignManager,
    h.Loc,
    h.Location,
    h.OrgStartDate,
    h.FixTermEndDate,
    h.LoanStartDate,
    h.LoanEndDate,
    h.EEGrp,
    h.EmployeeGroup,
    h.Annualsalary,
    h.Curr,
    h.NInumber,
    h.Birthdate,
    h.Ageofemployee,
    h.EO,
    h.Ethnicorigin,
    h.NID,
    h.Rel,
    h.ReligiousDenominationKey,
    h.SxO,
    h.WageType,
    h.EmployeeSubgroup,
    h.LOAAbsType,
    h.LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    h.Schemereference,
    h.PensionSchemeName,
    h.DisabilityCode,
    h.DisabilityText,
    h.DisabilityCodeDescription,
    h.PArea,
    h.PayrollArea,
    h.AssignmentNumber,
    h.FTE2,
    h.Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    CURRENT_DATE() AS PDAC_ETL_Date,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive,
    COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) AS leave_entitlement_hrs,
    COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0) AS leave_taken_hrs,
    ROUND((COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - COALESCE(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0) - COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)), 2) AS leave_remaining_hours,
    COALESCE(ROUND(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 2), 0) AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours

FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr_monthly h
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost sc 
ON 
    h.PersNo = sc.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = co.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    LeaveTaken lt 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = lt.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.pension_ernic_rates p
ON 
    sc.grade = p.Grade
WHERE 
   RIGHT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS STRING), 5) IN ('01-31', '02-28', '02-29', '03-31', '04-30', '05-31', '06-30', '07-31', '08-31', '09-30', '10-31', '11-30', '12-31');

%%sql

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_fact_absence_all AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        PersNo,
        PSGroup,
        PersonnelArea,
        PersonnelSubarea,
        Report_MonthEnd_Date
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            PersNo,
            PSGroup,
            PersonnelArea,
            PersonnelSubarea,
            Report_MonthEnd_Date,
            ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PersNo ORDER BY Report_MonthEnd_Date DESC) AS rn
        FROM 
            odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
    ) dedup
    WHERE rn = 1 -- Keep only the latest record for each PersNo
) AS source
ON cast(target.staffnumber as int) = source.PersNo
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET 
        target.PSGroup = source.PSGroup,
        target.PersonnelArea = source.PersonnelArea,
        target.PersonnelSubarea = source.PersonnelSubarea;

%%sql

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.sap_hr_fact_Absence_All AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        a.staffnumber,
        p.PSGroup,
        p.PersonnelArea,
        p.PersonnelSubarea,
        p.Report_MonStart_Date,
        p.Report_MonthEnd_Date
    FROM 
        odw_harmonised_db.fact_Absence_All a
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT 
            PersNo,
            PSGroup,
            PersonnelArea,
            PersonnelSubarea,
            -- Subtract 30 days as an approximation for 1 month
            date_sub(Report_MonthEnd_Date, 30) AS Report_MonStart_Date,
            Report_MonthEnd_Date 
        FROM 
            odw_harmonised_db.Hist_SAP_HR 
       -- WHERE 
          --  Report_MonthEnd_Date < (SELECT MAX(Report_MonthEnd_Date) FROM odw_harmonised_db.Hist_SAP_HR)
    ) p
    ON cast(a.staffnumber as date) = p.PersNo
    --AND a.absence_date BETWEEN p.Report_MonStart_Date AND p.Report_MonthEnd_Date
) AS source
ON cast(target.staffnumber  as int) = source.staffnumber
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET 
        target.PSGroup = source.PSGroup,
        target.PersonnelArea = source.PersonnelArea,
        target.PersonnelSubarea = source.PersonnelSubarea;
